title: Regal Neelam Haaram: 18K Gold Necklace with Sapphires and Diamonds
materials: Crafted in 18 Karat Gold. Features a dazzling array of vibrant Neelam (Sapphire) gemstones
with round and pear-shaped cuts. Showcases 0.88 carats of brilliant-cut diamonds. Setting is platinum with a polished finish.
features: This contemporary Haaram design incorporates a series of graduated sapphires, each embraced by intricate floral motifs set with sparkling diamonds. The alternating pattern creates a graceful silhouette around the neckline. The necklace culminates in three dramatic sapphire and diamond-encrusted pendants, offering a modern take on traditional South Indian jewelry. The platinum setting enhances the gemstone's brilliance.
colors: Features a striking color palette with rich
deep blue sapphires and bright white diamonds against the warm tone of 18K gold. Platinum provides contrast.
occasions: and grand celebrations. A perfect statement piece for the modern Telugu bride or for any special occasion where you want to exude elegance and grace. Can be used for both traditional Seemantham or Half-saree ceremonies.
description: This Neelam Haaram is a testament to modern design, featuring brilliant blue sapphires and sparkling diamonds set in 18K gold. The detailed craftsmanship and bold color combination make it a statement piece that will be cherished for generations. The high-quality gemstones and precious metal ensure lasting value and beauty. A modern interpretation of the traditional Haaram, this necklace offers a unique blend of cultural heritage and contemporary style.
